title: The Real Housewives di Napoli
overview: On Dplay Plus all the episodes of the most exuberant, fashionable and true "housewives" of the best neighborhoods of Naples are already available! In their lives, absolutely out of the ordinary, they are friends but also rivals par excellence. We will discover the lives of Daniela, Maria Consiglio, Noemi, Raffaella, Simonetta and Stella!
